workflow.name: Loop Execute for Upper and Lower Sidekicks

steps.name: Perform OOB firmware upgrade for Sidekick RackSCM PSU.

steps.description: Send the Rack SCM command to perform the OOB Rack SCM firmware upgrade.

steps.name: Sleep for 10 min.
steps.description: Sleep for 10 min. Required for Sidekick RackSCM to reboot and start responding to http requests.

steps.name: Reset Rack Manager/Rack SCM.
steps.description: Reset Rack Manager/Rack SCM based on the reset type. CPLD hard reboot required for the firmware upgrade to take effect.

steps.name: Sleep for 10 min.
steps.description: Sleep for 10 min. Required for Sidekick RackSCM to reboot and start responding to http requests.
